messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Borders Educator's Discount Oct 14-18
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/13/2005 6:05:51 AM Eastern Daylight Time, fetteroll@earthlink.net writes: 25% off  on *any* book not just for educational purposes.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/13/2005 6:05:51 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
fetteroll@... writes:

25% off on *any* book not just for "educational" purposes.

Simultaneously they're having a buy 3 get the 4th free and buy 2 get
the 3rd free on certain genres and titles and you get 25% off those too.

Sometimes they've asked me for proof, sometimes not. (For MA I've
just shown them my approval letter from the superintendent.)



~~~~~~~~~~
Wouldn't ya know it would be on a weekend when we'll be away... the exact
dates too! LOL... My luck...

Jenny
Homeschooling in Greenfield, MA
Danny (12-1-99), Kelsey (11-1-01) and Evelyn (5-19-04)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Education is not filling a pail but the lighting of a fire. ~William Butler
Yeats



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
